categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Rogelo was a EF76 Nebulon-B frigate used by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

When a TIE Fighter destroyed the Rebel Probe PR-V74, the fighter was on its way to the corvette Astin when the frigate arrived and began launching Z-95 Headhunters to destroy the fighter. However, the frigate was unsuccessful and lost most, if not all fighters.
The event was recorded for the Combat chamber to train future TIE pilots. One of those pilots who played this mission was Maarek Stele.
